parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: First side: 0 = Full length 1 = Intermittent 2 = Staggered

parameters.name: Size1
parameters.description: Size of fillet on first side

parameters.name: Length1
parameters.description: Length of fillet on first side

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Pitch, if Intermittent or Staggered on both sides

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Second side: 0= Full length 1 = Intermittent 2= Staggered

parameters.name: Size2
parameters.description: Size of fillet on second side

parameters.name: Length2
parameters.description: Length of fillet on second side

parameters.name: Flag
parameters.description: 0 = One-sided and no tangent propagation 1 = Two-sided 2 = Tangent propagation 3 = Two-sided and tangent propagation

parameters.name: EdgeNum1
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on first side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge1
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on first side

parameters.name: EdgeNum2
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on second side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge2
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on second side
